seed_pair: I thought you were very brave to say that.
Pensé que fuiste muy valiente al decir eso.

phrases.known: I thought I was going to go.
I didn't think it was difficult.
I thought I was going to be ready.
phrases.target: Pensé que iba a estar preparado.

phrases.known: I thought that was a good idea.
phrases.target: Pensé que eso era una buena idea.

phrases.known: I thought you needed to look for something to do today.
phrases.target: Pensé que necesitabas buscar algo que hacer hoy.

phrases.known: I didn't think we would have bought a house there.
phrases.target: No pensé que habríamos comprado una casa allí.
